## setPreference

Sets a widget preference.

```
PUT /prefs/{key}
(value)
--- 200 OK
(value)
```

| request | type | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| key | string | The preference key. |
| value | [Preference](Preference.md) | The preference value. |

| response | type | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| value | [Preference](Preference.md) | The preference value. |
